com.mindfusion.charting

Class Plot2DController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.PlotController
      • com.mindfusion.charting.Plot2DController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mindfusion.charting.components.ComponentController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PanController, ZoomController

    public class Plot2DController
extends PlotController
    A base class for controllers that let users interact with Plot2D objects.

        public Plot2DController(RenderContext renderContext,
                        boolean vertical)
        Initializes a new instance of the Plot2DController class.
        Parameters:
        renderContext - A RenderContext instance.
        vertical - true to implement interaction along the Y axis, or false for the X axis.
